-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | colored pretty-printing within ghci
--   
@package ghci-pretty
@version 0.0.2


-- | This module combines the ipprint package and the hscolour package to
--   provide colored pretty-printing in ghci.
--   
--   <i>Usage</i>
--   
--   Add the following lines to your <tt>ghci.conf</tt> file:
--   
--   <pre>
--   -- Pretty printing of it
--   import IPPrint.Colored
--   :set -interactive-print=IPPrint.Colored.cpprint
--   :def cp (\_ -&gt; return ":set -interactive-print=IPPrint.Colored.cpprint")
--   :def ncp (\_ -&gt; return ":set -interactive-print=print")
--   </pre>
--   
--   Now you can enable colored pretty-printing in ghci with the commmand
--   
--   <pre>
--   :cp
--   </pre>
--   
--   The following command turns colored pretty-printing off again
--   
--   <pre>
--   :ncp
--   </pre>
module IPPrint.Colored
cpprint :: Show a => a -> IO ()
